page.include: api client api a5 listbox class
page.description: Methods and properties available for interacting with a List Control object.
page.discussion: To get a list object, use the *[js:{dialog.object}.getControl]* method:

description.p: The List Control object inherits methods and properties from the A5.ListBox Class. These methods are listed below. A large number of properties are available, as well. For a complete listing of properties, see the [A5.ListBox Class] documentation.
If a List has a Detail View or a Search Part, additional properties and methods may be available. These methods are dynamically added to the List Control at runtime.
Specifies whether or not a list's state should be restored from local storage. If set to *[js:false]* before a list is restored, the list's state will not be restored.
See the List [onInitialize] client-side event for more information.

property.name: suspendPersist
property.description: Used to temporary suspend persisting List data to Local Storage or the File System. Only applies to Lists with *[link:Persist data to Local Storage (or Filesystem)]* enabled. See *[link:listObj.addTableRow Method]* for additional information.

link.link: api client api a5 listbox class

page.terms: UX List,UX List Properties,UX List Methods
